title: Wrap TanStack Router tree with ManualAuthProvider to prevent initial load crash

requirements.summary: Prevent `useManualAuth` runtime error by ensuring `ManualAuthProvider` wraps the entire routed application tree (RootLayout/AppLayout/AppHeader and all pages) without modifying `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
acceptanceCriteria: Loading the app at `/` no longer shows the error: "useManualAuth must be used within ManualAuthProvider".
`LandingPage` renders successfully at `/` with header/footer visible.
Visiting `/login`, `/admin`, and `/employer/candidates` does not trigger the provider error.
No changes are made to `frontend/src/main.tsx` (provider is added in an editable file such as `frontend/src/App.tsx`).

file_operations.description: Import `ManualAuthProvider` from `frontend/src/hooks/useManualAuth.tsx` and wrap the RouterProvider (and any routed UI like layouts/pages) so that `RootLayout`, `AppLayout`, `AppHeader`, and all route components render within the provider context, while keeping `frontend/src/main.tsx` unchanged.
